metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0227 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability affected the Apache Axis 1.4 distribution that was last released in 2006. Security and bug commits commits continue in the projects Axis 1.x Subversion repository, legacy users are encouraged to build from source. The successor to Axis 1.x is Axis2, the latest version is 1.7.9 and is not vulnerable to this issue.

notes.Note: ebarretto> StockQuoteService.jws not present in Debian binary packages

criterions.comment: axis package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
